attributes.action: Reduce the amount of tax payable by HM Forces veterans and Emergency services personnel, including NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to acknowledge service to the crown and the country by reducing the amount of tax paid by those that have served for over 22yrs and are now retired and in receipt of pensions and those that are in receipt of pensions awarded due to injury and/or ill health and who have served their crown and country for one year or more. This should include military personnel and those employed in the emergency services and national health service.
